question: Do you believe in spirits?  For the last 2 or 3 months, "something" knaws at my toes and scratches up and down my feet (not painful, yet: just annoying) -- and it keeps me awake and wakes me from sleeping.  Is this an ACUTE stage of nerve damage?  I've had juvenile diabetes for 56.4 years and do have diabetic nueropathy in my legs, but this agravation is new!  Any where I can read about this?
title: Nerve Damage in Feet
